QuestData.Title: The Lesson of the Iron Bough
QuestData.Description: First, you will need a weapon suited to your talents. Retrieve a crossbow from one of the weapon racks below, bring it to me, and show me that you know how to hold it properly.
QuestData.LogDescription: Retrieve and equip a Trainee's Crossbow.
QuestData.RewardText: A fine weapon. It should suit your needs well.$B$BNow let's put it to use.

Objectives.Objective: Loot and Equip a Trainee's Crossbow
